Assalamualaikum WBT,  
Salam Sejahtera,

IEEE Photonics Society Malaysia (MyIPS) in collaboration with Lightwave Communication Research Group (LCRG), Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (UTM), would like to invite you to the Photonics Lecture Series in conjunction with International Day of Light.

The details are as follows:

üìç**Date :** 16 May 2023 (Tuesday)  
üìç**Time:** 11.00 am ‚Äì 13.00 pm

üìç**Venue :** Bilik Mesyuarat Utama, Level 2, P19a, Faculty of Electrical Engineering, UTM

üìå **Speakers:**

2\. Dr Mohd Rashidi Bin Salim  
Department of Communication Engineering, Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia.
